name: Waht a Shame
description:
Play as a distraught Waluigi after he gets rejected from the Smash Ultimate roster in this short but funny visual novel. 

Meet Isabelle, Incineroar, Piranha Plant, and Inkling girl while trying to find all three endings. Each ending comes with a unique ending screen.

Four short songs, many bad puns, and a very emotional lanky purple god.

Okay not gonna lie a ton of the art is low quality but my art program screwed up and I had 8-11 hours to make this. Please understand.
